response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price, which I believe is fair and reflective of its true value. My offer to you is $960,000. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 960000}
